name: account_migration_user_pool_precheck
description: This table is used to store preliminary checks for user accounts before migration in a non-production environment.

columns.name: run_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each migration precheck run.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current status of the migration precheck process.

columns.name: interestresolvetype
columns.description: Type of interest resolution applied during the precheck.

columns.name: depositnonterminterestcode
columns.description: Code representing the type of non-term deposit interest.

columns.name: account_count
columns.description: Total number of accounts involved in the precheck.

columns.name: cif_count
columns.description: Total number of customer information files involved in the precheck.

columns.name: record_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the record was created or last updated.
